mapper.select: select u.name,ud.value,ud.title,ud.created,ud.remark ,ud.sub_title from user_wallet_detail ud,user_info u where ud.user_uuid=u.uuid order by ud.created desc limit #{offset}, #{limit};
select count(*) from user_wallet_detail ud,user_info u where ud.user_uuid=u.uuid;

select count(distinct ud.user_uuid) from user_wallet_detail ud,user_info u
where ud.user_uuid=u.uuid and ud.in_or_out=1 and DATE_FORMAT(ud.created,"%Y-%m-%d") BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime};

select count(distinct ud.user_uuid) from user_wallet_detail ud,user_info u
where ud.user_uuid=u.uuid and ud.in_or_out=0 and DATE_FORMAT(ud.created,"%Y-%m-%d") BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime};
select u.name,uw.balance as value from user_wallet uw,user_info u where uw.user_uuid=u.uuid order by value desc limit #{offset}, #{limit};
select count(*) from user_wallet uw,user_info u where uw.user_uuid=u.uuid;
